pageProps.content:
### Experience 

#### Full Stack Web Developer

2 Car Pros - Remote

September 2021 to Present

- I am working at 2CarPros.Com as a full-stack developer.
- I use PHP, MySQL, JS, and JQuery to expand and update and expand the site.

#### Freelance Worker

Divine Star LLC - Hastings, MI

2019 to Present

- Created my own LLC and started accepting web projects from clients.
- Developing several open-source projects.
- Currently developing a video game in TypeScript and Babylon.Js.
- Built several sites in WordPress and with React/Next.js.

#### Web Designer

Real Agent Works

2020 to February 2021

Designed sites for realtors all around the country. In charge of finding and editing all photos for the sites.

- Did basic JavaScript and HTML for some clients.
- Worked remotely and communicated with the team and management through Slack.

#### Web Programmer

University Marketing and Communications at Michigan Technological University - Houghton, MI

2017 to 2020

- Worked in a professional environment with graphic designers, writers, videographers, and web developers.
- Help them move from an old CMS to an XSLT/PHP based CMS called OU

Campus. Developed a PHP script to export content to make the process easier.

- Built new and expand upon features for their CMS. Rebuilt their image cropping gadget and built utility gadgets for management.
- Worked to implement AA web accessibility standers compliance in each project and site.
- Constructed web pages and web apps that interacted with MySQL databases and or

Google Sheets.

- Worked with groups and university departments to add features or improve their sites.

#### Media Specialist

University Marketing and Communications at Michigan Technological University - Houghton, MI

June 2017 to November 2018

- Worked with a videographer to make marketing material for Michigan Tech.
- Recorded and edited videos in the Adobe Suite.
- Used Adobe After effects and Illustrator to make basic animations and effects.
- Worked with a team of people to make a consistent image and message.
- Assisted in video archiving and storage management.

---

### Education

##### Associate in Humanities 

###### Minor in Computer Science

Michigan Technological University - Houghton, MI

2015 to 2020

---
